name: post-createPermit
description: Create permits for a recurring contract, including support for defining restrictions.

merchantAccount.description: The merchant account identifier, with which you want to process the transaction.

permits.description: The permits to create for this recurring contract.

recurringDetailReference.description: The recurring contract the new permits will use.

shopperReference.description: The shopper's reference to uniquely identify this shopper (e.g. user ID or account ID).

partnerId.description: Partner ID (when using the permit-per-partner token sharing model).

profileReference.description: The profile to apply to this permit (when using the shared permits model).

resultKey.description: The key to link permit requests to permit results.

validTillDate.description: The expiry date for this permit.

singleUse.description: Only a single payment can be made using this permit if set to true, otherwise multiple payments are allowed.

value.description: The amount of the transaction, in [minor units](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).

$ul: **permitResultList**: List of new permits.
